channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Yellow lines covered with leaves - cars parking in places where there are no bays, 21st October
item.description:
Cars parking on yellow lines as they are assuming there are bays (covered by leaves), but there are no bays at this space. Two cars have been there all day, no traffic warden in sight. The leaves need to be cleared to avoid this part of the road being blocked as it’s at the top of a hill, and a blind spot when driving down the road. There will be an accident soon!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of rubbish dumped here and not picked up by bin people this morning, again, 21st October
item.description:
5-8 bags mixed rubbish, food, clothes, bathroom materials strewn all over the pavement outside 41 and 43 Gloucester Place, again. Why do the bin people not take the rubbish? I have a business here and it is not good enough.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Gloucester Place, Marylebone, London
